title: Investigate Cazador's Palace
content:
nd his former self, unafraid of anything. The sun's constraints and Cazador's influence no longer bind him. He asserts his unique capability to confront Cazador. Astarion instructs them to leave, and they vanish abruptly. Respond to Astarion with:

I commend your compassion for sparing them. They might alert Cazador to our approach. We should have eliminated them.

Upon selecting the second option, Astarion concurs, acknowledging their likely warning and resultant trepidation. He empathizes with
